label: remote_s_address
model_reason: The remote_s_address should point to the AMF IP for proper communication. Updating this ensures the CU can reach the AMF for signaling.
reference_reason: Matches the CN_AMF_IP from the reference device table

label: integrity_algorithms
model_reason: Using unsupported integrity algorithms can cause CU startup failures. Ensuring only supported algorithms like nia0, nia1, nia2, and nia3 are used resolves potential initialization issues.
reference_reason: No direct reference, but using only supported integrity algorithms
